content.question: In ancient Hawaii, male nobles wore traditional feather garments such as the ‘ahu ‘ula (feather cape) in battle because the

choices.label: red feathers indicated that the wearer was protected by the gods
quetzal feathers were connected with superiority in battle
feathers demonstrated a connection to warriors on other islands
feathers were associated with funerary rituals and the underworld

content.answer: red feathers indicated that the wearer was protected by the gods

topic.text: 9.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Explain the meaning or significance of continuity and/or change between works of art (or groups of related works of art) within a related artistic tradition, style, or practice.
